amendment.description: Amendment sought to authorize a competitive grant program for colleges and universities to establish and oversee information technology education recruitment projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 51 in the Congressional Record of April 28, 1998 to create a new Postsecondary Information Technology Education Recruitment Program to provide grant funds to institutions of Higher education.

action.text: On agreeing to the Owens amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 234 (Roll No. 123).
